climbs.name: Lounge Tomato
climbs.fa: Chris Burton, Jeremy Taylor, Jeremy Smith. May 1998.

content.description: climb straight up the face, along the seam. watch for loose chickenheads as you top out.
content.protection: four bolts. gear needed for anchor way back from the top. small to medium cams.
content.location: the leftmost route on the wall. walk/scramble off to the right.

climbs.name: Flip the Switch
climbs.fa: Chris Burton, Jeremy Taylor (J.T.), Jeremy Smith. Sept. 1997

content.description: climb up past five bolts. mind the chickenheads as you top out.
content.protection: five bolts. small to medium sized cams for the anchor way back and to the right.
content.location: the rightmost of the three routes on the wall. climb/scramble down off to the right.

climbs.name: Comforts of Madness
climbs.fa: Daniel Hudgins (D.T.), Jeremy Smith, Jeremy Taylor. Sept. 1997.

content.description: climb straight up the center of the wall. this is probably the tallest of the three routes on the wall.
content.protection: five bolts. small to medium sized cams for the anchor way back from the top, on the right.
content.location: the center route on the wall. descend by climbing/scrambling down off to the right.
